name: Carrot Cookies
author: Marian M. Essner
instructions: Cream oleo. Gradually beat in sugar, salt and vanilla. Beat until fluffy. Add carrots. Sift flour; measure and sift with baking powder. Add to carrot mixture. Drop by teaspoon on lightly buttered cookie sheet. Flatten the cookie dough a little. Bake in preheated 350Â° oven for 12 to 15 minutes. Frost immediately with orange, orange rind and enough powdered sugar to thicken. Should be thin. These are a healthy cookie.
